activities: Subex generally does not collect personal information from individuals in the EU but may receive personal information from its customers and affiliates for processing; Subex may obtain personal information regarding employees of Subex affiliate companies (Organization Human Resources Data) in the UK, EU or Switzerland for internal review/business purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Subex is committed to cooperating with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) and Switzerland (Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)) or their authorized representatives.
